snippet: Federal prosecutors have charged a Harvard student with making bomb threats that led to the evacuation of four campus buildings on Monday.
abstract: Federal prosecutors charge Harvard student Eldo Kim with making bomb threats that led to evacuation of four campus buildings and cancellations of some final exams.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors have charged a Harvard student with making bomb threats that led to the evacuation of four campus buildings on Monday.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Student Is Charged in Bomb Threat
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Student Is Charged in Bomb Threat
